attributes.action: look at the role of the media in criminal cases and defend the rights of peaceful, law - abiding people to be a) protected by the state b) from journalsitic juries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The case of TV presenter Mark Speight, who recently has gone missing, shows how the vultures of the press put so much pressure on individuals in crisis that they recoil.

Another legal case ruined, another career shattered, another peaceful, law abiding family demonised by irresponsible newspaper editors. More breaches of confidentiality between the police station, the GP surgery and the newsagents. 

I am still waiting for a response from the PM. in respect of my earlier letter voicing my concerns on the effect that the paparazzi and ambulance - chasing is having on the delivery of healthcare in Britain.

Can we as a nation not somehow address this problem ? because next it may be YOU !

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
